sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_customercentral.CustomerInformationServiceSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Gets installed as part of "com.sn_csm_customer_central" plugin Customer Central.
Contains all the methods to perform Customer Information related operations.</description>
        <name>CustomerInformationServiceSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CustomerInformationServiceSNC = Class.create();
CustomerInformationServiceSNC.prototype = {
	initialize: function(custCentralContext) {
		this.custInfoDao = new CustomerInformationDao();
	},
	getCustomerInfo: function(context, target, sysId, pageInfo) {
		if (!context || !target || !sysId)
			return {
				"status": 400,
				"message": gs.getMessage("Make sure context, context instance and target details passed are valid")
			};
		if (pageInfo && pageInfo.start && pageInfo.end) {
			pageInfo.start = parseInt(pageInfo.start);
			pageInfo.end = parseInt(pageInfo.end);
			if (pageInfo.start > pageInfo.end)
				return {
					"status": 400,
					"message": gs.getMessage("Invalid pagination values : start can not be greater than end")
				};
		}
		try {
			var result = this.custInfoDao.getCustomerInfo(context, target, sysId, pageInfo);
			result.status = '200';
			return result;
		} catch (error) {
			return {
				"status": "400",
				"error": error.message
			};
		}
	},

	type: 'CustomerInformationServiceSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-03-06 08:17:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2af244470f170010e6d4fd820b767ea5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CustomerInformationServiceSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Central" source="sn_customercentral">7a9ab70373830010e37d71ef64f6a78b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Customer Central">7a9ab70373830010e37d71ef64f6a78b</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2af244470f170010e6d4fd820b767ea5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-19 10:09:19</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
